title: Dawn of Discovery™: Venice

gpu: X.Org AMD Radeon (TM) R9 Fury Series (FIJI, DRM 3.26.0, 4.18.14-041814-generic, LLVM 7.0.0)
notes: Ran the game for around 30 minutes, had the odd sound glitch, but everything was fine. Requires DXSetup.exe to be installed as per the instructions in the reports below.  Setting this via launch options failed, so I removed them, and ran the command through terminal. (I then set wineprefix=~/.wine after install)
